name: Myriad Magnets
description:
After a shipwreck, an experimental droid boots for the first time, awakening at the bottom of the sea.

Use its control over magnetism to escape.

Credits:

Masato Lin - Creative Director and Programmer

Gage Tilly - Level Designer, Sound Designer, and Composer

Christian Blanton - Programmer and Tech Artist

Ally Guo - Artist and UI Designer
